Articles.Content:
The timer starts when you stage. No OP mods, debug menu (except non-excessive clipping, use your judgement) The asteroid needs to land on Kerbin safely (at less than 10m/s) or be in an orbit with an apoapsis below 500km, an apoapsis above 80km and eccentricity of below 0.1. Scoring:

(Time in seconds * class loss) * (kerbals lost + 1)

Class loss:

Class E: 1

Class D: 1.25

Class C: 2

Class B: 3

Class A: 5

Lowest score possible, have fun!

Nah, but it requires a safe landing. I'll add a litl' something about that.
